testcase.name: User enters value in Amazon search bar and checks search bar works correctly
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Amazon home page...........................................passed When User clicks on amazon search bar.......................................passed And User types "selenium" in search bar and clicks enter icon...............passed Then User should see "selenium" within results page.........................passed

testcase.name: User heads to etsy,con and searches for an item and sees expected item in search result
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Etsy home page.............................................passed When User clicks on main search bar.........................................passed And User types "decor" in search bar........................................passed And User clicks on search icon..............................................passed Then User should be able to see "decor" in results page.....................passed

testcase.name: User enters value and checks search bar works correctly
testcase.system-out: Given User is on google home page...........................................passed When User clicks on search bar..............................................passed And User types "Tesla" in search bar and clicks enter.......................passed Then User should see "Tesla" in results page................................passed
